name: Frog Gone Fishing
description:
Frog Gone Fishing is casual fishing game based around catching fish, earning money and spending it on a variety of awesome hats. You play as a frog who uses their tongue to collect fish while avoiding things like fish bones and tin cans, or face a cash penalty. Some hats grant you with multipliers to increase cash collection. Catch fish, get money and collect all the hats available. Keep an eye out for the elusive legendary fish!

Credits: 

Design/Programmer - Adam Thomson

Lead Artist - Dan Sheard

Artist - Jess Pearson

Artist - Holly Mountcastle

Artist - Thomas Lilly
